alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 9:02PM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts, Apple and Lucerne Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest along the ridges and into the adjacent desert.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
